sentences.sContent: Military planners tried to circumvent the treaty.
sentences.sCn: 军事计划员们试图避开此条约。

remMethod.val: circum(绕圈) + vent(来) → 绕着圈过来 → 回避

trans.tranCn: 回避； 用计谋战胜或回避
trans.tranOther: If someone circumvents a rule or restriction, they avoid having to obey the rule or restriction, in a clever and perhaps dishonest way
